unnormalised: Automotive Buzz: Bangalore Traffic Gets a Makeover!
normalised: Automotive Buzz: Bangalore Traffic Gets a Makeover!

unnormalised: Bangalore's notorious traffic is about to face a new sheriff in town! Dr. Meena Iyer, Commissioner of Police, announced a slew of new traffic regulations aimed at easing congestion.
normalised: Bangalore's notorious traffic is about to face a new sheriff in town! Doctor Meena Iyer, Commissioner of Police, announced a slew of new traffic regulations aimed at easing congestion.

unnormalised: First up, stricter enforcement of lane discipline. Think twice before cutting lanes near Silk Board – the challans are going up! Also, no more parking your Innova wherever you fancy. Designated parking zones only, folks!
normalised: First up, stricter enforcement of lane discipline. Think twice before cutting lanes near Silk Board – the challans are going up! Also, no more parking your Innova wherever you fancy. Designated parking zones only, folks!

unnormalised: The city is also experimenting with AI-powered traffic light management at key junctions like Koramangala and MG Road. Early reports suggest a 15% reduction in wait times!
normalised: The city is also experimenting with A I powered traffic light management at key junctions like Koramangala and M G Road. Early reports suggest a fifteen percent reduction in wait times!

unnormalised: Heavy vehicles are now restricted during peak hours (8 AM - 11 AM & 5 PM - 9 PM) on Outer Ring Road. This move is expected to unclog the area around ITPL significantly.
normalised: Heavy vehicles are now restricted during peak hours (eight A M - eleven A M and five P M - nine P M) on Outer Ring Road. This move is expected to unclog the area around I T P L significantly.

unnormalised: Rumour has it that the Transport Dept. is also considering implementing congestion pricing, especially around areas with high commercial density (like a 1000 sq ft office space!).
normalised: Rumour has it that the Transport Department is also considering implementing congestion pricing, especially around areas with high commercial density (like a one thousand square feet office space!).

unnormalised: Penalties? Expect to shell out more Rs. for violations. They're not kidding around.
normalised: Penalties? Expect to shell out more rupees for violations. They're not kidding around.

unnormalised: Let's hope these changes actually make a difference and we can finally spend less time in our cars and more time sipping chai!
normalised: Let's hope these changes actually make a difference and we can finally spend less time in our cars and more time sipping chai!
